title: snowflake.snowpark.CaseExpr | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
To construct this object for a CASE expression, call the functions.when()
specifying a condition and the corresponding result for that condition.
Then, call when() and otherwise() methods to specify additional conditions
and results.
Sets the default result for this CASE expression.
Sets the default result for this CASE expression.
Appends one more WHEN condition to the CASE expression.
